item.title: my first post
item.description: Below is some sample code: SELECT * FROM `users` `u`;first.onchange = function() { myWorker.postMessage([first.value,second.value]); console.log('Message posted to worker'); } second.onchange = function() { myWorker.postMessage([first.value,second.value]); console.log('Message posted to worker'); } <?php $xml=simplexml_load_file("note.xml") or die("Error: Cannot create object"); echo $xml->to . "<br>"; echo $xml->from . "<br>"; echo $xml->heading . "<br>"; echo $xml->body; ?> <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <title>Title of the document</title> </head> <body> The content of the document...... </body> </html>

item.title: my first post
item.description: Below is some sample code: SELECT `u`.* FROM `users` `u`;first.onchange = function() { myWorker.postMessage([first.value,second.value]); console.log('Message posted to worker'); } second.onchange = function() { myWorker.postMessage([first.value,second.value]); console.log('Message posted to worker'); } <?php $xml=simplexml_load_file("note.xml") or die("Error: Cannot create object"); echo $xml->to . "<br>"; echo $xml->from . "<br>"; echo $xml->heading . "<br>"; echo $xml->body; ?> <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <title>Title of the document</title> </head> <body> The content of the document...... </body> </html>
